thread.title: Ben Bernanke Loosens Up During His Post-Crisis Years

author: Ben Eisen
title: Ben Bernanke Loosens Up During His Post-Crisis Years
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal has checked in on dozens of the bankers, government officials, chief executives, hedge-fund managers and others who left a mark on that period to find out what they are doing now. Today, we spotlight former Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke and Icelandâ€™s ex-prime minister, Geir Haarde.
As Federal Reserve chairman, Ben Bernanke went before a congressional committee 10 years ago this month and grimly warned that a recession appeared to be coming. These days, his economic...
